content.rendered:
Warm Fresh Rocket Salad

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 box Fry’s Thick Cut Chunky Strips
1 packets fresh rocket leaves
2 cups flat leaf parsley, washed
1 medium red onion, sliced into rings
100 vegan cheese
Balsamic vinegar
Olive oil

Directions

Fry the onion rings until softened in a little oil, set aside and keep warm.

Fry Strips in a little oil for 6-8 minutes, set aside and keep warm.

To assemble the dish, place the rocket and parsley in a bowl and dress with the olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Place a handful of Strips and onion rings on top. Garnish with grated vegan cheese.

Serve with warm ciabatta bread.
